attributes.action: Invoice the Governments of the Countries of Origin  All costs  to the British Tax payer  incurred in the process of the repatriation and or deportation of :-  Illegal Immigrants , Terrorists and Criminals  to the point of their returning to their own Countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
